verses.verse: וְהָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> And the famine כָּבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> [was] sore בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which כִּלּוּ֙ <S%H3615><s%> had finished לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> eating אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֶּׁ֔בֶר <S%H7668><s%> the corn אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הֵבִ֖יאוּ <S%H935><s%> which they had brought out מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> their father שֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> unto them Go again שִׁבְרוּ־ <S%H7666><s%> buy לָ֥נוּ מְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> us a little אֹֽכֶל׃ <S%H400><s%> food

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> about יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying הָעֵ֣ד <S%H5749><s%> did solemnly הֵעִד֩ <S%H5749><s%> protest בָּ֨נוּ הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> The man לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> unto us saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> Ye shall not see פָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> my face בִּלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> except אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> your brother אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> for

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יֶשְׁךָ֛ <S%H3426><s%> If thou wilt מְשַׁלֵּ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> send אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָחִ֖ינוּ <S%H251><s%> our brother אִתָּ֑נוּ <S%H854><s%> for נֵרְדָ֕ה <S%H3381><s%> with us we will go down וְנִשְׁבְּרָ֥ה <S%H7666><s%> and buy לְךָ֖ אֹֽכֶל׃ <S%H400><s%> thee food

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אֵינְךָ֥ <S%H369><s%> not מְשַׁלֵּ֖חַ <S%H7971><s%> But if thou wilt not send לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> we will not נֵרֵ֑ד <S%H3381><s%> [him] we will not go down כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָאִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> for the man אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H413><s%> about לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> You will not תִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> unto us Ye shall not see פָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> my face בִּלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> unless אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> except your brother אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel לָמָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> Why הֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <S%H7489><s%> Wherefore dealt ye [so] ill לִ֑י לְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> with me [as] to tell לָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הַע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still לָכֶ֖ם אָֽח׃ <S%H251><s%> they

וַיֹּאמְר֡וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said שָׁא֣וֹל <S%H7592><s%> asked שָֽׁאַל־ <S%H7592><s%> us straitly הָ֠אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> The man לָ֣נוּ וּלְמֽוֹלַדְתֵּ֜נוּ <S%H4138><s%> of our state and of our kindred לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַע֨וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still אֲבִיכֶ֥ם <S%H1><s%> [Is] your father חַי֙ <S%H2416><s%> age הֲיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> there are לָכֶ֣ם אָ֔ח <S%H251><s%> your brother וַנַ֨גֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> bewray ל֔וֹ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> him according פִּ֖י <S%H6310><s%> to the tenor הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> of these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> we הֲיָד֣וֹעַ <S%H3045><s%> could we certainly נֵדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> would יֹאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> that he would say הוֹרִ֖ידוּ <S%H3381><s%> down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיכֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> your brother

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> unto Israel אָבִ֗יו <S%H1><s%> his father שִׁלְחָ֥ה <S%H7971><s%> Send הַנַּ֛עַר <S%H5288><s%> the lad אִתִּ֖י <S%H854><s%> and we וְנָק֣וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> with me and we will arise וְנֵלֵ֑כָה <S%H1980><s%> and go וְנִֽחְיֶה֙ <S%H2421><s%> that we may live וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not נָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> and not die גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> well אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> well אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> well טַפֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H2945><s%> both we and thou [and] also our little ones

אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> myself אֶֽעֶרְבֶ֔נּוּ <S%H6148><s%> I will be surety מִיָּדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> for him of my hand תְּבַקְשֶׁ֑נּוּ <S%H1245><s%> shalt thou require אִם־ <S%H518><s%> him not לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not הֲבִיאֹתִ֤יו <S%H935><s%> I bring אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> to you וְהִצַּגְתִּ֣יו <S%H3322><s%> unto thee and set לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> him before thee וְחָטָ֥אתִֽי <S%H2398><s%> then let me bear the blame לְךָ֖ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> for ever

כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> surely לוּלֵ֣א <S%H3884><s%> For except הִתְמַהְמָ֑הְנוּ <S%H4102><s%> we had lingered כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> surely עַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> now שַׁ֖בְנוּ <S%H7725><s%> surely now we had returned זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> he פַעֲמָֽיִם׃ <S%H6471><s%> this second time

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> about יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אֲבִיהֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> And their father אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If כֵּ֣ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> so אֵפוֹא֮ <S%H645><s%> unto them If [it must be] so now זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עֲשׂוּ֒ <S%H6213><s%> do קְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> this take מִזִּמְרַ֤ת <S%H2173><s%> of the best fruits הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> in the land בִּכְלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3627><s%> in your vessels וְהוֹרִ֥ידוּ <S%H3381><s%> and carry down לָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H582><s%> as מִנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> a present מְעַ֤ט <S%H4592><s%> a little צֳרִי֙ <S%H6875><s%> balm וּמְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> and a little דְּבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> honey נְכֹ֣את <S%H5219><s%> spices וָלֹ֔ט <S%H3910><s%> and myrrh בָּטְנִ֖ים <S%H992><s%> nuts וּשְׁקֵדִֽים׃ <S%H8247><s%> and almonds

וְכֶ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money מִשְׁנֶ֖ה <S%H4932><s%> double קְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> And take בְיֶדְכֶ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> in your hand וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֜סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and the money הַמּוּשָׁ֨ב <S%H7725><s%> that was brought again בְּפִ֤י <S%H6310><s%> in the mouth אַמְתְּחֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H572><s%> of your sacks תָּשִׁ֣יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> carry [it] again בְיֶדְכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> in your hand אוּלַ֥י <S%H194><s%> perhaps מִשְׁגֶּ֖ה <S%H4870><s%> peradventure it [was] an oversight הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיכֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> also your brother קָ֑חוּ <S%H3947><s%> Take וְק֖וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> and arise שׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> go again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> unto the man

וְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> And God שַׁדַּ֗י <S%H7706><s%> Almighty יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> give לָכֶ֤ם רַחֲמִים֙ <S%H7356><s%> you mercy לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man וְשִׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> that he may send away לָכֶ֛ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> brother אַחֵ֖ר <S%H312><s%> your other וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְיָמִ֑ין <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin וַאֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> I כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> If שָׁכֹ֖לְתִּי <S%H7921><s%> I be bereaved שָׁכָֽלְתִּי׃ <S%H7921><s%> [of my children] I am bereaved

וַיִּקְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> took הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> the men אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֣ה <S%H4503><s%> present הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> that וּמִשְׁנֶה־ <S%H4932><s%> double כֶּ֛סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money לָקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> and they took בְיָדָ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> in their hand וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin וַיָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> and rose up וַיֵּרְד֣וּ <S%H3381><s%> and went down מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> Joseph

וַיַּ֨רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> And when Joseph אִתָּם֮ <S%H854><s%> with אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְיָמִין֒ <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> them he said לַֽאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> to the ruler of his house הָבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> Bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> [these] men הַבָּ֑יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> home וּטְבֹ֤חַ <S%H2873><s%> and slay טֶ֙בַח֙ <S%H2874><s%> an animal וְהָכֵ֔ן <S%H3559><s%> and make ready כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִתִּ֛י <S%H854><s%> are to יֹאכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> shall dine הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> for [these] men בַּֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <S%H6672><s%> with me at noon

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> bade יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> as Joseph וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> brought הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and the man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> the men בֵּ֥יתָה <S%H1004><s%> house יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> into Joseph's

וַיִּֽירְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> were afraid הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> now the men כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because הֽוּבְאוּ֮ <S%H935><s%> because they were brought בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house יוֹסֵף֒ <S%H3130><s%> into Joseph's וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and they said עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against דְּבַ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> Because הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> of the money הַשָּׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> that was returned בְּאַמְתְּחֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H572><s%> in our sacks בַּתְּחִלָּ֔ה <S%H8462><s%> at the first time אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we מֽוּבָאִ֑ים <S%H935><s%> are we brought in לְהִתְגֹּלֵ֤ל <S%H1556><s%> that he may seek occasion עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against וּלְהִתְנַפֵּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> against us and fall עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> against וְלָקַ֧חַת <S%H3947><s%> upon us and take אֹתָ֛נוּ <S%H853><s%> לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> us for bondmen וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמֹרֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H2543><s%> and our asses

וַֽיִּגְּשׁוּ֙ <S%H5066><s%> And they came near אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the steward אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph's וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> and they communed אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to him פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> with him at the door הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> of the house

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> And said בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> O אֲדֹנִ֑י <S%H113><s%> sir יָרֹ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> we came indeed יָרַ֛דְנוּ <S%H3381><s%> down בַּתְּחִלָּ֖ה <S%H8462><s%> at the first time לִשְׁבָּר־ <S%H7666><s%> to buy אֹֽכֶל׃ <S%H400><s%> food

וַֽיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> came כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> when בָ֣אנוּ <S%H935><s%> And it came to pass when we came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּל֗וֹן <S%H4411><s%> to the inn וַֽנִּפְתְּחָה֙ <S%H6605><s%> that we opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַמְתְּחֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H572><s%> our sacks וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold כֶֽסֶף־ <S%H3701><s%> money אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> and behold [every] man's בְּפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> [was] in the mouth אַמְתַּחְתּ֔וֹ <S%H572><s%> of his sack כַּסְפֵּ֖נוּ <S%H3701><s%> our money בְּמִשְׁקָל֑וֹ <S%H4948><s%> in full weight וַנָּ֥שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> and we have brought it again אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּיָדֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in our hand

וְכֶ֧סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money אַחֵ֛ר <S%H312><s%> And other הוֹרַ֥דְנוּ <S%H3381><s%> have we brought down בְיָדֵ֖נוּ <S%H3027><s%> in our hands לִשְׁבָּר־ <S%H7666><s%> to buy אֹ֑כֶל <S%H400><s%> food לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֔עְנוּ <S%H3045><s%> we cannot tell מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> who שָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> who put כַּסְפֵּ֖נוּ <S%H3701><s%> our money בְּאַמְתְּחֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H572><s%> in our sacks

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> And he said שָׁל֨וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Peace לָכֶ֜ם אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֗אוּ <S%H3372><s%> [be] to you fear אֱלֹ֨הֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H430><s%> not your God וֵֽאלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> and the God אֲבִיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> of your father נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given לָכֶ֤ם מַטְמוֹן֙ <S%H4301><s%> you treasure בְּאַמְתְּחֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H572><s%> in your sacks כַּסְפְּכֶ֖ם <S%H3701><s%> your money בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> I had אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> then וַיּוֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> And he brought אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H8095><s%> Simeon

וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> brought הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> the men בֵּ֣יתָה <S%H1004><s%> house יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> into Joseph's וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and gave מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> [them] water וַיִּרְחֲצ֣וּ <S%H7364><s%> and they washed רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7272><s%> their feet וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and he gave מִסְפּ֖וֹא <S%H4554><s%> provender לַחֲמֹֽרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H2543><s%> their asses

וַיָּכִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H3559><s%> And they made ready אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> the present עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בּ֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> came יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <S%H6672><s%> at noon כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> for they heard כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there יֹ֥אכְלוּ <S%H398><s%> that they should eat לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> bread

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> came יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And when Joseph הַבַּ֔יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> home וַיָּבִ֥יאּוּ <S%H935><s%> they brought ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֥ה <S%H4503><s%> him the present אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בְּיָדָ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> which [was] in their hand הַבָּ֑יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> into the house וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed ל֖וֹ אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> themselves to him to the earth

וַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <S%H7592><s%> And he asked לָהֶם֙ לְשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> them of [their] welfare וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הֲשָׁל֛וֹם <S%H7965><s%> well אֲבִיכֶ֥ם <S%H1><s%> [Is] your father הַזָּקֵ֖ן <S%H2205><s%> the old man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of whom אֲמַרְתֶּ֑ם <S%H559><s%> of whom ye spake הַעוֹדֶ֖נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> again חָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> age

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> And they answered שָׁל֛וֹם <S%H7965><s%> [is] in good health לְעַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> Thy servant לְאָבִ֖ינוּ <S%H1><s%> our father עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> is still חָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> he [is] yet alive וַֽיִּקְּד֖וּ <S%H6915><s%> And they bowed down their heads [וַיִּשְׁתַּחוּ כ] (וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוּֽוּ <S%H7812><s%> bow down ק)

וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> And he lifted up עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וַיַּ֞רְא <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְיָמִ֣ין <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin אָחִיו֮ <S%H251><s%> his brother בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אִמּוֹ֒ <S%H517><s%> his mother's וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הֲזֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> is this אֲחִיכֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> brother הַקָּטֹ֔ן <S%H6996><s%> [Is] this your younger אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> of whom אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> of whom ye spake אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> unto me? And he said אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> God יָחְנְךָ֖ <S%H2603><s%> be gracious בְּנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> unto thee my son

וַיְמַהֵ֣ר <S%H4116><s%> made haste יוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִכְמְר֤וּ <S%H3648><s%> did yearn רַחֲמָיו֙ <S%H7356><s%> for his bowels אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> upon his brother וַיְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> and he sought לִבְכּ֑וֹת <S%H1058><s%> [where] to weep וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> and he entered הַחַ֖דְרָה <S%H2315><s%> into [his] chamber וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> and wept שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיִּרְחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> And he washed פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> his face וַיֵּצֵ֑א <S%H3318><s%> and went out וַיִּ֨תְאַפַּ֔ק <S%H662><s%> and refrained וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> himself and said שִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> Set on לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> bread

וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> And they set on ל֛וֹ לְבַדּ֖וֹ <S%H905><s%> himself וְלָהֶ֣ם לְבַדָּ֑ם <S%H905><s%> themselves וְלַמִּצְרִ֞ים <S%H4713><s%> for him by himself and for them by themselves and for the Egyptians הָאֹכְלִ֤ים <S%H398><s%> which did eat אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> by לְבַדָּ֔ם <S%H905><s%> themselves כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכְל֜וּן <S%H3201><s%> might הַמִּצְרִ֗ים <S%H4713><s%> with him by themselves because the Egyptians לֶאֱכֹ֤ל <S%H398><s%> not eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעִבְרִים֙ <S%H5680><s%> with the Hebrews לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because תוֹעֵבָ֥ה <S%H8441><s%> for that [is] an abomination הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he לְמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4713><s%> the Egyptians

וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> And they sat לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> before him הַבְּכֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn כִּבְכֹ֣רָת֔וֹ <S%H1062><s%> according to his birthright וְהַצָּעִ֖יר <S%H6810><s%> and the youngest כִּצְעִרָת֑וֹ <S%H6812><s%> according to his youth וַיִּתְמְה֥וּ <S%H8539><s%> marvelled הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> one אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> at another

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> And he took מַשְׂאֹ֜ת <S%H4864><s%> [and sent] messes מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> פָּנָיו֮ <S%H6440><s%> unto them from before him אֲלֵהֶם֒ <S%H413><s%> as וַתֵּ֜רֶב <S%H7235><s%> so much as מַשְׂאַ֧ת <S%H4864><s%> mess בִּנְיָמִ֛ן <S%H1144><s%> but Benjamin's מִמַּשְׂאֹ֥ת <S%H4864><s%> portions כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> any חָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> was five יָד֑וֹת <S%H3027><s%> times וַיִּשְׁתּ֥וּ <S%H8354><s%> any of theirs And they drank וַֽיִּשְׁכְּר֖וּ <S%H7937><s%> and were merry עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with
